data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Dongming, Zhang, Yalin (2019): Two new species of the genus Reticuluma Cheng & Li (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae Deltocephalinae: Penthimiini) from China. Zootaxa 4668 (2): 289-295, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4668.2.10|4 occurrences
